title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.en: I’m a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped Into a Gyaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um Garoto do Ensino médio, mas troquei de Gênero e Me Tornei uma Gal

description.en:
Shunpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! 
Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.

It's the beginning of an introverted high school guy => gender-swapped gyaru comedy!

---
- [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja:
陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。
母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！
ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
陰キャ男子高校生⇒ギャルTSコメディ開幕！！
description.pt-br:
Shunpei, um estudante solitário do ensino médio, se tornou uma gal depois de salvar a deusa das gals de se afogar. Através das conexões de sua mãe, ele conseguiu transferir-se para uma escola só para meninas, mas estava cheia de gals!
 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

altTitles.ja: 弱虫オメガは溺愛されたい

altTitles.en: Cowardly Omega Wants to Be Doted On

altTitles.vi: Omega Yếu Đuối Muốn Được Yêu Thương

description.en:
Thoughtful young man (⍺) x introverted painter (Ω)

Love remakes life!!

Ruka – creator of the famous character Mimigel – is an illustrator with an introverted personality. Because he was tired of being changed too much, not to his liking, he gave up the copyright to the character Mimigel and took a plane to move to a far away place to live. During his flight, the plane suddenly had a shaking problem. Before he knew it, he found himself in a world where strange words like "second gender," "omega," "sex" were everywhere.

And what will his new life be like?!

Sunghoon was a normal high schooler until one day, he finds out he is engaged to a tiger from Korean mythology. It is foretold that the world will end unless Sunghoon marries the tiger. This story begins with the cute smile of the tiger girl.  
  
*Notice: This series reads like a manga, from right-to-left.*

From Starlight Scans:  
  
Meirin, a junior high schooler, is the real identity of the famous "Dr. Rin" who heads a very popular feng sui website. She is in love with her best friend Asuka, a member of the soccer team. "Dr. Rin"'s advice has granted success for many, yet Meirin's own love life doesn't seem to be going too smoothly?

altTitles.ja: アップルパルフェ おねロリ百合アンソロジー

description.en:
The relationship between "girls" and "women".
A completely new yuri anthology of "onee-and-loli" stories, all by different authors.

Cover: Kawaku

**Chapters**:
1. **Mashiro-chan's future lover** (Mashiro-chan no Mirai no Koibito, ましろちゃんの未来の恋人) by Itou Hachi
2. **Midnight funeral Where I can't let it be found** (Zettai ni Bare te wa Ikenai Soushiki 24-ji, 絶対にバレてはいけない葬式２４時) by Canno
3. **Scent and reflection** (Kaori to Kaze, 香りと影) by Terayama Den
4. **The Place Where We Belong** (Futari no Ibasho, ふたりの居場所) by Hazuki
5. **My Little Sister's Loved One** (Imouto-chan no Daisuki na Mono, 妹ちゃんの大好きなもの) by Izumi Kirifu
6. **Koma-chan and Sensei's Time** (Koma-chan to Sensei no Jikan, こまちゃんとせんせいのじかん) by kurimo.
7. **Failure** (Dame na Hito, だめなひと) by Masanaga
8. **A Dream of Spring on a Tatami Mat** (Ichi-jou Shunmu, 一畳春夢) by Sakasana

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr:
Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359 !

Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix.

Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja:
男女比率1対359!!　359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!!　つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!!　コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!!
四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

description.en:
Marlee, an agent of the advanced civilization Central on the planet Blue Ear, finds himself on a mission to track down the troubadour Lagthorin. His mission leads him to the planet Corundum, where he finds the elusive musician and subsequently dies. Back at Central, he is regenerated into a new clone, Marlee Two, who sets off once more, drawn back to Lagthorin and her song. And so the strings of fate guide Marlee forward, inescapably intertwined with both the events on the planet Corundum and, 30,000 years across time, with the long-extinct race of the planet Silver Triangle.  
  
A 1-volume classic sci-fi manga.  
  
Winner of the Seiun Award in 1983.

Sesame saves Rice Cake in the park, and they part ways. Rice Cake saves Sesame in the park, and this time, they become friends after Rice Cake's owner takes in Sesame. They become friends, but will that friendship progress to something more? Oh, and they're cats. GL series, infrequent updates (translator made description)  
Author Weibo: <https://www.weibo.com/xllb0118?refer_flag=1005055013_&is_all=1>

Danjou Yamato is a high-school student who lives in the countryside and is the boxing champion of the region. However, when his family has to move out to live in Tokyo, he is transfered to a school in Tokyo that was previously an all-girls school. Girls have a lot of power and give the guys a hard time. But Yamato will not bow down to the power of the girls, and on his way to claim power for the guys in the school, he finds out something about his past… something that he had forgotten long ago…

title.en: A Marriage of Convenience: The Love Between a King and Queen

altTitles.ja: 白い結婚　－王と王妃の恋ものがたり－

description.en: The tale of a wife who loves her husband, and an older husband who knows what's right. This manga is aimed at young women.

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.vi: Chuyên gia trêu chọc Takagi-san (ngoại truyện)

altTitles.ja: からかい上手の（元）高木さん

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong (Noon) si Takagi-san

description.en:
Takagi and Nishikata are now married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*
description.pt-br:
Takagi e Nishikata agora estão casados e têm uma filha na idade do jardim de infância chamada Chi. Veja o quanto algumas coisas mudaram e outras curiosamente permaneceram as mesmas!

Nota: Os volumes coletam os capítulos em uma ordem diferente da versão web. Os capítulos aqui seguem a numeração da web sem nenhum volume.

title.en: Fairy Tail x The Seven Deadly Sins Christmas Special

altTitles.en: Fairy Tail x The 7 Deadly Sins Christmas Special

altTitles.ja-ro: Fairy Tail x Nanatsu no Taizai Christmas Special

description.en: Hiro Mashima of Fairy Tail and Nakaba Suzuki of Nanatsu no Taizai team up for a special Christmas story, based on each other's work: Meliodas, Elizabeth Liones, and Hawk are visiting the city of Magnolia for Christmas, and Meliodas' offer to buy a present for Elizabeth goes awry. Upon returning from a job, Natsu Dragneel and Happy spot a suspicious visitor on the roof of their guild, which leads to an odd confrontation.

altTitles.ja: 偽りのマリィゴールド

description.en:
Kasumi Hana travels to meet her deceased older brother’s penpal, Urushizawa Lily, with the aim to inform her of his passing.

As well as the intent to kill her, if Urushizawa had only been using him.

But when they meet, instead Hana finds a woman who truly loved her late brother, and who has lost her eyesight.

For Lily’s sake, she resolves to take her brother’s place.

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 4 「Let's Save the Royal Academy Library!」

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～第四部 貴族院の図書館を救いたい!

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

description.en:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!

An alternate Mazinger Z manga by OUTA Gosaku. Not to be confused with the version by NAGAI Go.  
  
It follows the anime timeline of events.

The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!

title.en: Danjo no Yujou wa Seiritsu suru? (Iya, Shinai!!)

altTitles.ja: 男女の友情は成立する？（いや、しないっ！！）

altTitles.en: Can a Boy and Girl Friendship Hold Up? (No It Can't)

altTitles.zh: 男女之间真的存在友情吗

description.en:
At a rural junior high school, a man and a woman vowed an eternal friendship. The relationship between the two who became a fateful community toward one dream-two years have passed without any particular progress ...!

　Yuu Natsume, a flower-loving plant boy, and Inuzuka Himari, a girl who hasn't been in love for the first time yet, have been peacefully close friends in the gardening club with only two of them.
description.ja: 未だに初恋がこない陽キャ女子・犬塚日葵と、花を愛する植物系男子・夏目悠宇はふとしたきっかけで友情に落ちた。 それから２年――相変わらず『親友』をやっているふたりだったが、悠宇がかつての初恋相手と再会したことで日葵と悠宇の関係も変わり出し……？

title.en: Tensei Shitara Akari dake ga Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転生したらあかりだけスライムだった件

altTitles.en: That Time Only Akari Got Reincarnated as a Slime

description.en: The Amusement Club gets transported to another world… and Akari turns into a slime. A new Yuru Yuri isekai spinoff.
Unbeknownst to their friends and classmates, Nanoha and Chidori are dating. Watch as they try to keep their relationship secret!
description.es: A las espaldas de sus amigas y compañeras the salón, Nanoha y Chidori están saliendo juntas. ¡Velas tratando de mantener su relación en secreto!

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

title.en: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

altTitles.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

altTitles.ja: ちるらん 新撰組鎮魂歌【レクイエム】

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.

altTitles.pt-br: Aulas de luta de primeira classe

description.en:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
description.pt-br: Kim Jaehyuk é um estudante do ensino médio que vive em desespero sob o tormento dos valentões. Ele é bom nos estudos, mas preferiria ser bom na luta. Então, o destino põe um "tutor de luta" em sua vida!

description.en:
When he was young, a herbivore named Hakka was picked up by a carnivore named Daiya when he was caught in a trap and was unable to move.
Daiya decided to keep him as "emergency food," but as they spent time together, they began to feel as if they were family.
Ten years pass and the two become adults.
Daiya still thinks of Hakka as family, but he realizes that Hakka's feelings are different from his own.
A manga about kids going through a year of High School. Watch as they go through the high and lows of relationships and learn a few things about life, love, and sushi while they're at it.
description.pt-br: Uma série 4-koma descrevendo vários cenários do amor de jovens. Estes contos variam de um garoto, incapacitado por sua absoluta falta de confiança em si mesmo, não pode sequer aceitar o fato de que a garota de seus sonhos, na verdade, pediu-lhe para saírem em uma encontro, até uma garota quase psicótica que derrama o próprio sangue em seu chocolate caseiro, a fim de ganhar o coração de seu amado.

description.en: Continuing in the same vein as previous installments, a new collection of "everyday horror" vignettes.

title.en: Gedou Tenisha no Harem Dungeon Seisakuki

altTitles.ja-ro: Gedou Tenisha no Harem Dungeon Seisakuki

altTitles.ja: 外道転移者のハーレムダンジョン製作記

altTitles.es-la: Notas para Producir un Harem de Mazmorra para un Invocado de Otro Mundo
Registros de La Creación de La Mazmorra del Harem del Demonio de Otro Mundo

altTitles.zh: 外道转移者的后宫筑城记

altTitles.ja-ro: Gedou Ten'isha no Harem Dungeon Seisakuki

altTitles.en: Records of the Creation of the Demon Otherworlder's Harem Dungeon
Bad Reincarnation's Harem Dungeon Creation Story

description.en: While all of his classmate were transported to another world as heroes, for some reason he was left out as the dungeon master... and he, Satoshi Shinta, became the world's enemy. As the enemy of humankind, in order to survive and live a pleasant life in another world, he had a big choice to makeー. Through devilish methods, make his enemies fall, and strengthen his dungeon!! To violate his enemies or kill them, the curtain raises on (male) Satoshi Shinta's devilish dungeon management!!
description.id:
Disaat teman-temannya terisekaikan dan menjadi Hero, Nitta justru tercampakan dan menjadi seorang dungeon master, musuh dari seluruh umat manusia!  
tahu akan ancaman yang akan dihadapinya, dengan sekuat tenaga memperkuat dungeon yang dia buat, penyusup yang datang akan di tangkap, laki-laki akan di bunuh, sedangkan perempuan akan dijadikan mesin entod olehnya, semua itu dilakukannya demi menjalani hidup bajingan di isekai.

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

altTitles.tl: Paano Sanayin ang Iyong Jowang Utakbulok

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái bại não của tôi

description.en: Brainrot Girlfriend
My senpai challenges me to a fight with her, but if I win... Will she become my girlfriend!?

altTitles.th: ก้นหอยมรณะ

description.en:
On her way to the station to pick up Shuichi Saito, a high school student from a neighboring town, she finds Shuichi's father sitting in an alley, staring at a wall. 

He seemed oblivious to Kirie's greeting and continued to stare at the snail shell stuck to the wall... 

An out-of-this-world horror depicted by Junji Ito, the genius of new-sensation horror!
description.ru: Курозу — маленький японский городок. По словам Сюити Сайто, друга главной героини Кириэ Госимы, этот город проклят спиралями. Они видны повсюду — как в растениях или урагане, так и в людях. Отца Сюити одолевает навязчивая идея, и постепенно каждый житель города погружается в водоворот событий, из которого невозможно вернуться...
description.uk: Курозу – маленьке японське містечко. За словами Шюїчі Сайто, друга головної героїні Кіріе Ґошіми, це місто прокляте спіралями. Вони помітні всюди – як в рослинах або урагані, так і в людях. Батька Шюїчі оволодіває нав'язлива ідея, і поступово кожен житель міста занурюється у вир подій, з якого неможливо повернутися…
description.pt-br: Uzumaki conta a história de uma cidade assombrada, não por um fantasma ou demônio, mas por um padrão geométrico que domina a mente de seus habitantes. Em Kurouzu Cho, uma pequena cidade costeira do Japão, tudo parecia normal até que alguns de seus habitantes começarem a ter comportamentos muito estranhos, ligado a obsessão pela forma espiral. Tudo começa quando kirie Goshima vê o pai de seu namorado hipnotizado por uma casca de caracol e a partir daí, muitos coisas estranhas viriam acontecer.

title.en: Ai ga Omosugiru Uchi no Yandere Kaineko

altTitles.ja: 愛が重すぎるうちのヤンデレ飼い猫

altTitles.pt-br: Meu amor é muito pesado, minha gata de estimação yandere

altTitles.ja-ro: Ai ga Omosugiru Uchi no Yandere Kai Neko

altTitles.en: My Yandere Cat Whose Love is Too Heavy

altTitles.ja: 君に染まるモノクローム

description.en: Hajime Haibara is a boy whose first love has faded away. A mysterious senior student, Bikyu, appears in front of him and invites him into a "new world". Hajime falls in love with Bikyu while being pushed around by her!
description.pt-br: Sou Haibara, um garoto que conheceu uma "princesa" com quem estava escrevendo um "novo Mundo", mas do nada a princesa desapareceu. Com o passar do tempo ele encontra uma misteriosa senpai chamada Miyoru, esta garota é tão parecida com a princesa que desapareceu há muitos anos atrás. Poderia Miyoru ser a princesa que conheceu Sou na sétima série?

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

altTitles.th: 2.5 มิติ ริริสะ

description.en:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
description.ja: 現実の女に興味無し！俺の嫁・リリエルは2次元にあり！そんな漫研部長・奥村の前に現れたのは…リアルなリリエル？ドキドキコスプレコメディ開幕！
description.pt:
"Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu Liliel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu… uma Liliel real?  
Uma super comédia empolgante começa!
description.pt-br: "Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu, Liriel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu... uma Liriel real? Uma super comédia empolgante começa!

description.en: It all begins when a girl, Yumi, narrowly avoids a car accident thanks to the intervention of a magician named Tohru, who had a very promising career ahead of him. As a result of this event, Tohru suffers from a severe hand injury, cutting short his dreams of making it big in Hollywood. After 8 years they run into one another again, but Tohru's become a common criminal, and Yumi a rookie police officer.

altTitles.ja: あのキャラがABJマークとコラボ!

altTitles.ja-ro: Ano Chara ga ABJ Mark to Colabo!

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Shuppankoho](https://shuppankoho.jp/damage/tokusetsu-3.html) (Click the blue button)
- Video version - [YouTube](https://youtu.be/jCYUazxydpc)
description.ja:
海賊版でマンガが危ない!

ABJマークの付いているサービスで読もう!

- ABJマークって「なんの略」?
>「Authorized Books of Japan＝公認された日本の本」、つまり「正規の出版物」という意味です。

- どうして今、ABJマークなの?
> 残念なことにネット上には、いわゆる「海賊版」（クリエイターから許諾を得ずに、勝手にアップしている違法な電子出版物）があふれています。しかも、正規のサービスと見分けがつかない海賊版サイトも出現しています。一目で正規版サービスであることがわかるマーク、それがABJマークです。電子書店をはじめとする各サービスの目につくところ、おもにトップページに掲示されています。

- ABJマークって「なに」?
> 電子書店等を利用して電子出版物を楽しんでいる読者に対し、そのサービスが、クリエイターからきちんと許諾を受けて配信している正規のサービスであることを示すマークです（でも、正規のサービス全部についているわけではありません。これから、どんどん増えていきます）。

- ABJマークは「安心のマーク」
> このマークがあるサービスで読めば、安心です。海賊版サイトと知らずにアクセスすると、ウィルスやフィッシング詐欺、強制マイニングなどの危険にさらされる可能性があります。また、正規版で読んでいただくことによって、そこからクリエイターに対価が支払われ、新しい次の作品を生み出す力になります。海賊版サイトは、クリエイターに何の利益ももたらしません。運営者が不当に儲けるだけです。

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

description.en:
Alex, a devoted metalhead, finds himself in deep sorrow at his band’s breakup concert. Amidst the sadness, he experiences an electrical accident due to equipment trouble...

When he wakes up, he discovers he has been transported to another world! In this new world, Alex encounters situations that are a metalhead’s dream, featuring werewolves and dragons, which excite him immensely. 

Determined to lead this otherworld to peace with his metal spirit, Alex sets out on an adventurous journey!
description.es: Alex, un devoto metalero, se encuentra sumido en una profunda tristeza en el concierto de disolución de su banda. En medio de la tristeza, sufre un accidente eléctrico debido a problemas con el equipo... Cuando despierta, ¡descubre que ha sido transportado a otro mundo! En este nuevo mundo, Alex se encuentra con situaciones que son el «sueño de un metalero», con hombres lobo y dragones, que le excitan enormemente. Decidido a llevar a este otro mundo a la paz con su espíritu metálico, Alex emprende un viaje lleno de aventuras...
description.ja: メタルを深く愛するアレキは、バンドの解散ライブで悲しみに暮れる中、機材トラブルで感電事故に遭う……。そして目が覚めると異世界に転移していた！？ 異世界では、狼男、ドラゴンと『メタラーの夢』であるシチュエーションに次々遭遇し、興奮するアレキ。メタル魂で異世界を平和に導こうとするが……
description.es-la: Alex, un devoto metalero, se encuentra sumido en una profunda tristeza en el concierto de disolución de su banda. En medio de la tristeza, sufre un accidente eléctrico debido a problemas con el equipo... Cuando despierta, ¡descubre que ha sido transportado a otro mundo! En este nuevo mundo, Alex se encuentra con situaciones que son el «sueño de un metalero», con hombres lobo y dragones, que le excitan enormemente. Decidido a llevar a este otro mundo a la paz con su espíritu metálico, Alex emprende un viaje lleno de aventuras...

altTitles.en: The Legend and the Hero III

description.en: The conclusion of the Feng Shen Ji series.

The exorcist fell in love with me, a ghost...?!

A survival love story of a ghost who resorted to a false confession to survive from the exorcist.
description.ko:
퇴마사가 귀신인 나에게 반해버렸다...?! 
퇴마사로부터 살아남기 위해 거짓 고백을 해버린 한 귀신의 생존 서바이벌 연애기
description.ru: Вы бы признались кому-то в любви, если бы это означало спасение вашей жизни? Ну, это то, что я сделал. Я призрак по имени Умин, а моя девушка - охотница за привидениями. Довольно банально, я знаю... Честно говоря, я не знаю, как мне избавиться от нее, но я не могу позволить ей просто убить меня!

title.en: My Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.en: The Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha segunda vida é uma vida de cura?
Minha segunda vida é uma vida de curandeiro?

description.en: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
description.pt-br: Eugene Felivia, o querido filho mais novo da nobre família Felivia, conhecida por seus grandes guerreiros, ganha uma segunda vida graças à graça de ‘Felin, o Feiticeiro da Criação’. Eugene sonha em se tornar um bruxo como Felin, que o salvou, e usar seus poderes para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor. No entanto, a realidade sombria e dura e o seu destino ainda se recusam a deixá-lo ir…

description.en:
The sea is clear and the sky is full of stars. Kaname and Ami live in the countryside and are preparing for the school festival. Their relationship is somewhat close despite their clashes...?

A lyrical coming-of-age tale by Masaru Oishi!

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

description.en:
Seth is an apprentice sorcerer from the Pompo Hills. Like all sorcerers, he's an "infected", one of the few people having survived an encounter with a Nemesis, those creatures falling from the sky and destroying everything around them. Being immune to them, Seth wants to become a Hunter and fight the Nemesis. But what Seth really wants is to find the source of all Nemesis, the Radiant. Helped by his fellow sorcerers, he will seek the Radiant, under the harsh scrutiny of the Inquisition…


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2021)
description.fr:
Seth est un aspirant sorcier de la région des Pompo Hills. Comme tous les sorciers, c'est un " infecté " : un des rares êtres vivants ayant survécu au contact des Némésis, ces créatures tombées du ciel qui contaminent et déciment tous ceux qu'elles touchent. Son apparente immunité lui a fait choisir une voie qui lui semblait toute désignée : devenir Chasseur et combattre les Némésis.  
  
Mais plus que ça, Seth souhaite s'engager dans une quête qui dépasse la simple chasse aux monstres… Entouré d'une faction de sorciers, il parcourt le monde à la recherche du Radiant, le berceau présumé des monstres, sous l'oeil terrible de l'Inquisition…  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/nep_radiant)  
- [Mangaka’s Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tonytonyvalente/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](https://www6.nhk.or.jp/anime/program/detail.html?i=radiant)  
- [Official Page (JP)](http://www.euromanga.jp/category/title/radiant/)
description.ru: В мире, где на землю снизошёл гнев небес и появились мстители, человечество пытается из последних сил выжить… Как бы противно и страшно людям не было, но они вынуждены сотрудничать с существами, не менее опасными и ужасающими, чем пришельцы… С проклятыми изгоями общества, с колдунами! Сет – молодой, энергичный ученик колдуна, бравый парень, пытающийся под началом своего учителя уничтожить своего первого мстителя… Волей судьбы он находит его… или их… ДА ТУТ ЦЕЛОЕ СТАДО!!! Вперед, Сет! Вжарь им!
description.pt-br: Seth é um aprendiz de feiticeiro das colinas de Pompo. Como todos os feiticeiros, ele é um "infectado", uma das poucas pessoas que sobreviveram a um encontro com um Nêmesis, criaturas que caem do céu e destroem tudo ao seu redor. Sendo imune a eles, Seth quer se tornar um caçador e lutar contra os Nêmesis. Mas o que Seth realmente quer é encontrar a fonte dos Nemesis, o Radiant. Ajudado por seus companheiros feiticeiros, ele buscará o Radiant, sob a rigorosa caça da Inquisição contra os feiticeiros.

altTitles.en: The Cutest Girl Closest to Me.

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent! 

---
Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Seralization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).
description.es: En la casa donde vive con su hermana, Hi-chan, la amiga de su hermana, se queda frecuentemente. Ella tiene una cara perfectamente linda, y además de eso, no tiene sentido del espacio personal. Asahi, un estudiante de preparatoria otaku, ¿quedará a su merced...? ¡El popular one-shop “The Cutest Girl Closest to Me” ha sido retitulado y serializado!
description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

altTitles.ja: きみは, ニーナじゃない
きみは ニーナじゃない

description.en: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!
description.pt-br: Aoba é um jovem que sofreu um trauma devido a um terrível término de relacionamento. Por conta disso, desenvolveu medo de interagir com outras pessoas, deixou seu emprego e passou a viver fazendo trabalhos temporários, tendo como única alegria assistir às transmissões de sua streamer favorita. Certo dia, ao ser abordado por uma garota que costumava ver em seu caminho de volta para casa, ele acaba concordando em morar com ela? Ele fica surpreso ao descobrir que ela era justamente sua streamer favorita... Assim, tem início um romance transformador entre um rapaz de coração partido e uma streamer!
